hero.title: New Alienware Laptops
hero.headline: DESIGNED FOR VICTORY
hero.subhead: Conquer new worlds with the next generation of Alienware laptops.

item.name: feature1
item.title: Sturdy body
item.copy: An anodized aluminum shell and magnesium alloy frame protect your LCD.

item.name: feature2
item.title: Durable hinge
item.copy: Count on durability with a hinge designed to open and close up to 20,000 times.

item.name: feature3
item.title: Immersive lighting
item.copy: Customize your external lighting with over 10 billion color combos.

item.name: feature4
item.title: Ports
item.copy: Connect all your gaming gear with multiple ports to download media faster.

item.name: feature5
item.title: Sleek new design
item.copy: Break away from the standard with a distinctively designed system.

item.name: feature6
item.title: Maximum portability
item.copy: With excellent battery life, Alienware 14 is engineered for high-intensity gaming anywhere.

item.name: feature7
item.title:
Latest graphics
& processors
item.copy: Crank up the intensity with the fastest performance and most advanced graphics technology.

item.name: feature8
item.title: Full HD display
item.copy: Game after dark with a backlit keyboard and a 14” Full HD display with anti-glare coating.

item.name: feature7
item.title: Full HD display
item.copy: Game after dark with a backlit keyboard and a huge 18.4” Full HD screen with TrueLife™.

image.copy: Take control of the game with the redesigned Alienware Command Center. Choose your own lighting and special effects, accelerate your performance, monitor in-game results and more — all in one hub.
Create your own special effects and themes to express yourself with a unique look.
Set your zones to change color, pulse, remain solid or indicate an alert with a 20-color palette.
Customize specialty lighting effects based on in-game events in over 55 AlienFX-compatible games.
Customize how your game or application launches with themes or VOIP, and personalize which ones you want opened or closed upon launch.
Give your system a burst of speed by temporarily closing unneeded Windows-based applications. Your configuration doesn’t change and returns to its original state when the game is done.
Monitor your hard drive, memory, network, processor or graphics card usage with a tool that lets you track performance or identify problems in real-time or later.

Assign different functions to vertical and horizontal macro keys. Combine a series of keystrokes, create presets for your email, web or media player, or establish shortcuts that can launch a program with the press of a button. Only available on Alienware 17 and Alienware 18.
Create game-specific profiles you can use yourself and share with friends. When the game is done, restore a non-gaming profile for everyday use. Only available on Alienware 17 and Alienware 18.
Customize your settings to enable either “tap and drag” or “locking drag”, or disable tapping gestures completely.
Increase or decrease the sensitivity of your touch pad to make it more or less sensitive to contact with the palm of your hand.
Choose your own settings for vertical and horizontal gesture scrolling with AlienTouch, then customize the size of the scrolling regions that works best for you.
Take control of your power usage. Convenient quick settings enable you to choose between high-performance, balanced or power-saving modes.
Adjust the behavior of individual components such as wireless adapter, graphics processor and more to give you total control over your hardware in any power mode.
Create unlimited power plans to suit different needs. Optimize play for a specific game, then save and modify your plan in the AlienFusion interface.

exploreLightingRx.copy: Create your own customized lighting scheme from 10,240 billion possible combinations.

image.title: Together we triumph.
image.copy: Experience ultimate gaming with the next generation of Alienware laptops.

image.title: Alienware 17
image.copy: Get desktop gaming performance. Minus the desktop.

image.copy: The most powerful 18-inch gaming laptop in the universe.
